transArray.content: This is the second hotel we have stayed in in Beijing, and I have to say that this hotel is very cost-effective. There is a bus right in front of the hotel, which goes directly to Tsinghua University, Peking University, National People's Congress, Summer Palace and Old Summer Palace. It is also convenient to transfer to the subway. The room we stayed in was a double room. The bed was very big and the children slept comfortably.

I am Xiao Ji, the review specialist of the hotel: Thank you for your recognition of the hotel. The hotel is located near Suzhouqiao Subway Station on Line 16. It has convenient transportation and is quiet in the bustle. The summer is lush and lush, with different light and shadow from far and near; beautiful things and beautiful scenery. We look forward to your stay again.
